content.text: Requirements: the appearance, insulation resistance (6.2.6), contact resistance (6.2.5), voltage  proof (6.2.2) shall meet the requirements of this specification after test.
Exigences: l'aspect, la résistance d'isolement (6.2.6), la résistance de contact (6.2.5) et la  tension de tenue (6.2.2) doivent satisfaire aux exigences de la présente spécification après  essai.

requirements.text: Requirements: the appearance, insulation resistance (6.2.6), contact resistance (6.2.5), voltage  proof (6.2.2) shall meet the requirements of this specification after test.
